alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 2:56AM EST until February 10 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...A period of mixed precipitation is expected with air temperatures slowly rising above freezing allowing precipitation to change to rain. Expect slippery road conditions and avoid travel if possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
